parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the rendering distance.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''viewDistance'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] ("my view distance is " + [[str]] [[viewDistance]] + " meters");</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setViewDistance]], [[setDetailMapBlendPars]], [[setTerrainGrid]], [[getObjectViewDistance]], [[setObjectViewDistance]]
</value></part></template>
